values.help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).
values.label: Set to Default

values.help: The way how the button reacts when press/released
values.label: Button Type

items.label: Toggle light when button is pressed, no action when button is released.
Toggle light when button is released, Start dimming when button pressed.
Toggle light when button is pressed and when button is Released, start dimming when quickly press and release button.

values.help: The way the Built-in Dimmer reacts when light is turned on/off with button
values.label: Control Type

items.label: Switch own light on and send a Z-Wave message to all associated nodes (direct and extern)
Don.t switch own light on but only send a Z-Wave message to associated node. (extern only)

values.help: This parameter is used to enable the dimming option of the product. When disabled the dimming and fading routine are disabled.
values.label: Dimming enabled

values.help: The maximum powerload in watts when light is turned on, when measured higher then this value the Inline Dimmer is automatically turned off.
values.label: Maximum Powerload

values.help: The speed of dimming when activated (manual and RF). Dim speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)
values.label: Dimming Speed

values.help: The speed of fading up when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)
values.label: Fading up  Speed

values.help: The time window to repress button to start dimming. Toggle time is value (* 10ms)
values.label: Toggle time

values.help: A percentage that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 10%  Maximum value = 100%
values.label: Auto meter report: percentage

values.help: A watt value that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 5 watt  Maximum value = 255 watt
values.label: Auto meter report: watt

values.help: A time value that has to be passed compared to a previous sent value before a unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 10 seconds  Maximum value = 255 seconds
values.label: Auto meter report: time

values.help: What to do with lamp status when power applied. If 0x00: Always switch light off when power applied. If > 0x00: Switch lamp on/off depending on last known lampstatus before power was disconnected.
values.label: Last known status

values.help: The speed of fading up when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)
values.label: Fading down speed
